content: समूढ {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Brought together, assembled. {@--2@} Accumulated, collected. {@--3@} Enveloped. {@--4@} Associated with. {@--5@} Produced quickly. {@--6@} Calmed, tamed down, tranquillized. {@--7@} Crooked, bent. {@--8@} Purified, cleansed. {@--9@} Borne along. {@--10@} Led, conducted. {@--11@} Married.
